sobreMi.title: About Me
sobreMi.description: Hello, I am Martin, a Systems Engineering student with a solid background in Fullstack web development, acquired through a JavaScript bootcamp. My passion for technology is complemented by my professionalism and commitment. Additionally, I am an experienced athlete in yachting and kitesurf, disciplines I have practiced since childhood and that have taught me discipline, concentration, and teamwork. I am always ready to take on new challenges and contribute my energy and enthusiasm. If you are looking for someone who combines passion, professional dedication, and technical skills, I am the right person to join your team and contribute to the success of your projects.

inicio.name: Martin Gwozdz
inicio.title: Software Engineer in progress - Full Stack Developer
